## **Spatial Transcriptomics:** <br><br>Experimental Considerations and Analysis by 10X Genomics<br><br>

In this session, 10X Genomics will lead the discussion on the key analytical considerations of Visium and Xenium analysis, such as cell segmentation and panel design.<hr>

<read-time><span style="color:black;"><font size="3">**Monday 5th May, 1 pm**</font></span></read-time>

<read-time><span style="color:black;"><font size="3">WIMR Seminar Room</font></span></read-time>

</div>
